Industries: Apps, Enterprise Software, Information Services, Information Technology, Mobile Apps, Productivity Tools, Software
Industry Groups: Apps, Information Technology, Mobile, Software
Description: Preparing for sales meetings & calls is hard, time consuming. Get 1 page summary minutes before a meeting, search less and sell more!
Full Description: Problem 1. Typical business user in a company of 50+ people, use at-least 8 different applications. Customer information is scattered across these applications like Email, Customer Relationship Management (CRM) apps, Support software, Documents in Storage software etc., and many internal applications.  2. For a meeting or call with customer, business users spend lot of time preparing, searching across these applications and also for researching on web, users look for LinkedIn, Google for news, etc. Close to 30 mins will be spent to do proper research, opening multiple windows. 3. Salesforce internal metrics say 70% of the calls and meetings never make it to CRM, intentionally or unintentionally. This actually leads to lot of incomplete data and drastically affects revenue prediction and business continuity in case of person leaving the company or moving up the chain. Solution 1. 1 Page integrates almost all the applications that are commonly used by any organization and can integate any internal applications faster and customize the data quickly, for organization or role or individual. With 1 Page, organization can drastically improve adoption of CRM or any tool purchased or built. 2. Few minutes before a meeting, 1 Page alerts the user to prepare for meeting. User will get one page summary per attendee, with all recent emails between user and attendee, CRM data like account, opportunity info, files needed etc. Users can make notes for the meeting. Alerts also come when user gets a customer call. 3. Once meeting or call is over, 1 Page automatically logs the meeting to CRM, and prompts the user to record meeting/call details. User can leave a text note or voice note and is stored in CRM. Next time when user checks the profile of the customer, these notes will help them to recall past meetings/calls. Salient features Based on Indian patent filed in 2013, India patent grant in final stages. US Patent via PCT granted 2 more patents pending on ML/AI - Implementation to go live by end of this year Users can get started in 30 mins max Near Zero IT involvement  Encryption at rest, in transit  Works in Multiple Languages, can add a language in days New integration in days and customization in hours

Industries: Consumer, Dating, Lifestyle, Mobile Apps, Social Network
Industry Groups: Apps, Community and Lifestyle, Internet Services, Mobile, Other, Software
Description: Building connections one conversation at a time.
Full Description: The COVID-19 pandemic brought the world to a halt. Singles found themselves feeling more alone now than ever. Couples, who once stood strong during their greatest challenges, are now crumbling under the weight of the stresses the pandemic has brought. The pandemic forced us all to change how we live our lives and to think about what’s most important: the need and desire for a deeper connection with someone.  Singles need help connecting during actual dates (because this is where dating apps fail) and couples need help starting conversations beyond work, finances, schedules and kids. So how do you form a connection and maintain it? For singles looking to form a genuine connection on actual dates and couples looking to maintain their connection, 3rdDegree is the ice-breaking game that facilitates new levels of open communication. It’s a connection building app that takes honesty and vulnerability to create high quality conversations. It encourages face to face communication to build a connection by two people getting to ask the date questions we all want to know. Through game-like quizzes that score you based on your effort to open up, you will find out new, fun tidbits about your person. With questions that foster a deeper connection to help reveal the true essence of a person, singles can see if they truly are a good match beyond surface level and couples are motivated by the delight in unexpected discoveries of one another.  Dig deeper with 3rdDegree on first dates, following dates, or throughout a lifetime together.

Description: DTC personal baby products company for Mom and Baby
Full Description: Changing the name of changing.  Our model is different and it starts with our name: ABBY, an anagram for baby, refers to our first priority and FINN is an acronym for families in need. For too long, baby care and diapering has been approached the same way: the same old disposable diapers sold in stores, in pack sizes that don’t reflect usage. This model hasn’t been changed to reflect what today’s parents need : A convenient set-it-and-forget it approach to Baby Care that makes their busy lives easier; with high quality, design-oriented, earth-friendly products; and an opportunity for them to give to those in need with a purchase they are required to make.  Convenient.  You and your baby are at the core of our mission. We’re parents too; we know how busy life is and how little time you want to spend thinking about diapers. We’ve built the smartest, most flexible subscription model in the business. Our options enable you to choose the cadence that works for you, allows for multiple sizes within the same box, and enables a mix of our crowd-determined designs.  Conscientious.  We know how much your little one means to you, and that you want to make sure that any product touching their skin is gentle and effective (because blowouts happen!) We also understand how much you value the environment – you want it to be pristine for generations to come! For A&F, this means using the highest quality products that are gentler on the planet, with an eye for design.  Charitable.  Being a parent is one of the most universal experiences. We share many of the same hopes and dreams for our children – that they find their passion, experience gratitude and understand giving back. At A&F, we have built our business around giving back. Diaper need can have a huge impact in the lives of other parents and their ability to provide for their little ones, so A&F donates diapers to those in need for every purchase you make – because it’s never too early to start giving back

Description: The mobile application which aggregates all contractors around you. Disrupted «Craigslist» on «steroids».
Full Description: AbsMap is the mobile application, which displays contractors in the (nearest or chosen) area. A user, who wants to get any services such as, house cleaning, personal training or haircut could find all available contractors nearby via AbsMap and call them without intermediaries, fees and registration. As for the benefits for workers, AbsMap helps contractors to find clients nearby. This allows them not to waste time on travelling and make more orders in a day within one area. Moreover, contractors do not pay AbsMap a commission on orders, only a fixed amount for each day they received the order via AbsMap. At this moment, our team has the MVP (mobile application for Apple Store and Google Play) and it is on the beta testing stage.

Description: Activity based screen time management solution to help families better regulate screen time, get active and avoid device addiction.
Full Description: ACTIVATE is a patent pending technology that regulates screen time based on daily activity levels. The term “screen time” refers to an individual’s time spent using a device such as a mobile phone or tablet. This technology grants or denies screen time depending on the amount of daily activity that was performed by the device owner. Daily activity levels are generated through the use of Apple Health or a wearable fitness tracker like a Fitbit. ACTIVATE is a software that controls the amount of time an individual or family spends on their devices based on their physical activity. Parents define activity goals, and kids are rewarded with screen time once those goals have been met. Example: 5,000 Steps = 20 minutes of screen time. ACTIVATE is a solution that helps families or individuals maintain a healthy balance of physical activity, social interaction and time spent on devices.

Description: Connecting Brand Enthusiasts on Mobile
Full Description: We were voted as one of the best ideas coming out of Harvard Business School. And there is a reason for that. We are poised to capitalize on a large, white space in retail that will transform how specialty retailers and brands connect with their customers on mobile.     Activation provides specialty retailers in “enthusiast” markets with a branded customer management solution that bridges brick & mortar with mobile and commerce. Supported by a common back-end infrastructure, our products such as CycleMate which is targeted at the motorcycle industry are transforming how retailers engage, build loyalty with and monetize their customers.     Delivered as a consumer facing App with a back-end administrative panel, CycleMate, provides dealerships with a branded customer management solution to engage with their customers on mobile, bring them in-store and drive commerce sales. CycleMate is supported by our common back-end proprietary platform that can be scaled across new verticals. CycleMate uniquely leverages the smartphone to drive engagement for riders and provides them with specific tools to augment their riding experience, such as: automated bike maintenance and health alerts, weather related conditions, tracking and sharing of individual rides and accessory and product recommendations amongst others.     Dealers will be able to forge deeper connections with their customers through direct messages, personalized rewards, promotions and invitations. CycleMate is being delivered through an Application as a Service (AaaS) monthly subscription based revenue model (for dealers; free for their customers) and provides a distinct value proposition for both dealers and their customers.     Activation’s growth plans include extending its common back-end platform into new enthusiast based vertical markets. Management estimates an addressable revenue opportunity in excess of $5 BN in the U.S. across the 500,000+ targeted customers in its core enthusiast markets.

Description: Adobe Sign, formerly EchoSign is an e-signature and contract management company that helps its users get their documents signed online.
Full Description: Previously known as EchoSign, Adobe Sign services brings trusted e-signatures to your organization and makes 100% digital workflows a reality. It integrates with the entire Adobe Document Cloud portfolio of solutions. And it’s the only e-sign solution that lets you create secure digital document processes across your entire organization — while partnering with a single vendor. The company is a direct competitor to [DocuSign](http://crunchbase.com/organization/docusign) which took a substantial round of financing in the summer of 2007. EchoSign fired back with a second round of $6 million and partnerships with CRM powerhouse Salesforce.com, NetSuite, SAP, WebEx and [Zoho](http://crunchbase.com/organization/zoho).  Salesforce.com named EchoSign to the "Best Apps of 2012, "Best Apps of 2011", "Best Apps of 2010", "Best Apps of 2009" and "Best Apps of 2008", as well as a three-time AppExchange Essential. Adobe Sign's signature process requires users to email documents through its system which takes care of the signing process on the other side.  The recipients can e-sign instantly in any browser, an iPhone or a Blackberry, or via a widget on any website.  Or if desired, recipients can sign by fax using a toll-free fax gateway.   Adobe Sign also offers full integration with Google Apps / Google Docs, NetSuite, SAP Sourcing, Oracle CRM On Demand, eFax, DropBox, Evernote, Box.net, SugarCRM, Xobni and [SpringCM](http://crunchbase.com/organization/springcm). In July 2011, EchoSign was acquired by Adobe. https://acrobat.adobe.com/us/en/documents/esignatures.html

Industry Groups: Apps, Community and Lifestyle, Consumer Electronics, Education, Events, Hardware, Media and Entertainment, Mobile, Science and Engineering, Software
Description: Adventure Clubs is the essential app for finding, enjoying and creating epic childhood adventures
Full Description: Adventure Clubs are communities of families who enjoy epic childhood experiences created for young families. Families connect via a mobile app to search, discover, and create local experiences to share with their young children. The Adventure Clubs free mobile app offers an opportunity for families with young children to easily create beautiful childhood memories. Forget about those cumbersome lists of what to do with kids in a particular city. Just because something exists doesn’t mean there will be any other families there when you go. And we all know, everything is more fun in a group.  Our kids need education, socialization and stimulation, and so do we. That’s why Adventure Clubs exists. This is your opportunity to handcraft the life that your child dreams of… One that’s full of adventure, experienced with the person they love most–you! Adventures are exciting planned experiences, created by other parents just like you, and brought to you via the Adventure Clubs mobile app. Adventures are created and led by Adventure Leaders and may happen any day of the week. On any given adventure, there are usually 3 - 12 families including moms or dads, and their children (ages 6 months - 10 years). Imagine, every day opening up your Adventure Clubs app and being able to easily find what’s happening near you and then going on adventures alongside other families with kids!  It’s flexible too. You just adventure whenever it works for you–with no minimum, no maximum, no commitment at all. It’s easy and fun for parents, and incredible for kids!  With the Adventure Clubs app, you can: • Browse local adventures your family will enjoy • Choose and RSVP to adventures you like • Create your own adventures to experience with others • Invite your family and friends to adventure with you • Message co-adventurers before and after your adventure You can create or explore exciting local adventures in these twelve categories:  • Animals • Creative • Education • Environment • Food • Museums & Culture • Music & Dance • Parks & Playgrounds • Sports & Fitness • Transportation • Water Play • Other Through this app, we have loads of incredible, kid-friendly, local, family-oriented adventure options offered to us at our finger tips. Adventuring is experiential learning at it’s finest, and learning through experience is how kids learn best.  If you’d like to be an Adventure Leader, all you need is a great idea and you can create one on your Adventure Clubs app. You can set the adventure to “public” if you want to open it up to meet new friends or set it to “private” and invite only your current friends to join your adventure. There are two different kinds of adventures with Adventure Clubs:  • Everyday Adventures  • Premium Adventures An Everyday Adventure is something simple and easy to plan such as bike riding at a local park, hiking through the forest, getting hot chocolates and playing puzzles at a coffee shop, or making sandcastles on the beach. Forget about “play dates”-adventuring is way more fun!  A Premium Adventure is an extra special adventure that is set up by the Adventure Clubs team with a local Adventure Host, (a local business or non-profit organization). A Premium Adventure might be a special behind-the-scenes tour of a famous theater, or a baking class with a pastry chef, or a meet-n-greet with professional performers or athletes, a tour of a private jet. Adventure Clubs is always coming up with incredible ideas for Premium Adventures.  The price for each Premium Adventure is different and all of the information will be in the adventure description in the app and the amount for the Premium Adventure is to be paid directly to the Adventure Host (place of business or non-profit organization). Premium Adventures are led by our top leaders, who are hand-picked and trained by Adventure Clubs.  So what are you waiting for? Let’s go on an adventure!

Full Description: "Agiliway is a custom software development company founded by a group of IT experts who have been working in IT outsourcing industry for more than 20 years in USA and Ukraine and now leverage our experience to provide partners with flexible yet high-quality software development service. Agiliway is focused on following 5 directions: 1. IT Outsourcing Consulting — includes a full stack of services from helping clients in selecting an outsourcing destination in Eastern and Central Europe up to the building and optimizing their development centers with the most efficient business model approaches like BOT (build-operate-transfer model), greenfielding or partnering. 2. Custom Software Development — on-demand custom software development starting from requirements gathering to solution deployment and post-implementation maintenance in a wide range of technologies, including: • Mainstream Technologies (PHP, Java, C/C++, MS Stack); • BI and Big Data Solutions; • Web Development; • Mobile Development; • Quality Management. 3. Enterprise Solutions Implementation — encompasses custom CRM (CiviCRM, SuiteCMR, and SugarCRM) and ERP (Odoo) systems implementation, maintenance, and training for startups, SMBs, enterprises, and non-profits. 4. E-commerce Development — a full scope of e-commerce development services, including strategy development, integrations and migrations implementation, post-implementation support and maintenance to help our clients benefit from results-driven online stores built on popular e-commerce platforms (Magento, WooCommerce, Shopify, OXID e-Sales, Aimeos, etc.). 5. Business Process Outsourcing — providing more value to our clients by outsourcing different routine processes and functions to dedicated virtual assistants skilled in multiple business processes, like website administration and content maintenance, data entry, SEM/SMM, data mining / online research, and many more."

Description: The Agreeable Company is developing a mobile app (Agreeable) that allows individuals planning meetings.
Full Description: The Agreeable Company is developing a mobile app (Agreeable) that allows individuals planning meetings (especially those with strangers such as through Facebook Marketplace or Craigslist) to do so in a safer and more reliable manner. The in-app messaging and agreements function allows both parties to work out details, including a no-show fee. One setting particularly dense with no-shows is online classifieds, with more than a billion ads posted annual. Initial target customers are grouped by frequency of online classifieds use, including super sellers (buy or sell weekly); smart shoppers (buy or sell monthly); and spring cleaners (casual users of online classifieds). The app not only allows for meeting details to be set with both parties, but the app also detects whether either party is present at the time of the meeting using the users’ phone location technology. The app then automatically compensates the user when there is a no show. Additional features include a rating system on users and suggested safe meeting locations.

Description: Airbnb is an online community marketplace for people to list, discover, and book accommodations through mobile phones or the internet.
Full Description: Airbnb is an online community marketplace for people to list, discover, and book accommodations through mobile phones or the internet. The company connects travelers seeking authentic experiences with hosts offering unique, inspiring spaces around the world. Whether the available space is a castle for a night, a sailboat for a week, or an apartment for a month, Airbnb is the easiest way for people to showcase these distinctive spaces to an audience of millions. By facilitating bookings and financial transactions, Airbnb makes the process of listing or booking a space effortless and efficient. With 4,500,000 listings in over 65,000 cities in 191 countries, the company offers the widest variety of unique spaces for everyone, at any price point around the globe.  The company was co-founded in August 2008 by Brian Chesky and Joe Gebbia, and is currently headquartered in San Francisco, California.

Description: An Uber/Airbnb in food business - quick order and pre-orderd features allow private chefs to offer food-lovers home-made dishes on demand!
Full Description: AirBowl is a combination of Uber and Airbnb in Food Industry. It is an application that allows professional or amateur chefs to host guests in their home for lunch, dinner or just desserts. We will leave what is on the menu to the chefs and the eating to the guests.  People want to try food of different flavors. But they don't want to cook,  and they can not afford to go to restaurants frequently. Or they are tired of the same unhealthy restaurant flavors. Meantime people want to make extra money by working at home. Our service is perfectly complementary to the traditional ways of eating. It also allows ordinary people to make extra money just at home, with the cooking skills and setups they already have. We have explored in depth the negatives and positives of each competitor. We have incorporated all of what we believe and developed an application that is not just user friendly to the attending guests but gives the hosts the certainty they need to make the meal and payout happen. We believe our two key features i.e. pre-order feature and quick-order feature will take us way ahead of competitors in no time.

Full Description: AlerSenseTM was founded by a team of passionate people who are determined to change the way they look at airborne contaminants and toxins which could cause allergies, asthma and COPD issues. To date, the world has accepted the fact that allergy, asthma attacks and COPD issues occur without warning and “just happen”. They wanted to work on a project that would help people throughout the world understand when contaminants are building up in the home so that they can make the appropriate adjustments. They’ve combined some of the world’s most advanced detection hardware & sensors, with a smart mobile app that will allow users to record allergy, asthma and COPD symptoms (when they notice the symptoms) against the home airborne environment, at that precise moment. Their goal is to give consumers a system that will provide enough time to make a change to their environment while becoming smarter as more information is input into the system.

Description: Alphid is a consumer electronics and home automation platform.
Full Description: Alphid has a single goal of providing easy to use, anytime and anywhere ability to manage any household electronic device, applying intelligent workflows to manage legacy and future devices using cost effective technology and creating seamless home automation. With our inexpensive home automation device we offer our consumers a unique experience of using voice, touch or other means of interacting remotely with their home electronics and appliances. Zenno provides commonly used protocols like Infrared, Wi-Fi and RF, supported by a rich, versatile and intuitively software platform and a Software Development Kit (SDK) for customizable extensions. Our device can also act as a thermostat and has real-time control over air conditioning units and all its functions. Home control hubs in the market today do not provide adequate integration to legacy appliance or device using Infrared (IR) as a mean of control, neglecting the most common home electronics: TV, non-smart media playback devices (sound system, dvd player, home cinema) and air conditioners, to name a few. Zenno addressed this one big limitation seamlessly. Alphid has a functional hardware and software platform today, along with the associated App on multiple mobile platforms. We are in the process of finishing up on high accuracy speech recognition, adding more Wi-Fi enabled devices to our database and are developing applications for Android Wear and Apple Watch devices. We are targeting consumers with the following profile: Male and female with technology-affinity, 25-40 years old, home owner, English speaking from North America with 3+ IR home electronics and has a smart phone device. Later we will include consumers with wearable devices. Because one of our most attractive features is voice control, first available in English, we will target first the US, Canada and the UK.  After market validation through Kickstarter, we wish to expand to India, Australia and Spanish speaking regions.

Description: Digital Health Startup providing AI Services to transform caring for patients with neurodegenerative disorders. #AI, #ALZ, #Caregiving #SaaS
Full Description: Amicus Brain Innovations, Inc. is a NY-based digital health startup focused on bringing the power of Artificial Intelligence (AI) technology to transform caring for patients with neurodegenerative disorders.  As a woman-owned small business, our company is known for it values, diversity, inclusion and parity.  Even as an early stage startup, we walk the talk with women engineers making up more than 50% of our technical workforce.  The number of people in the US living with cognitive impairment (including Alzheimer’s Disease and related dementia) is over 5.8M today and is expected to increase to nearly 14M by 2050. The rapidly growing population of informal caregivers (more than 16M today) of people with cognitive impairment is subject to high stress due to patient behavioral symptoms, increased demands on caregiver time, and lack of adequate care-giving knowledge to address changing patient conditions. Caregivers face depleted income due to reduced productivity, higher use of health care services, decreased quality of life, higher burnout and risk of earlier mortality. The economic value of the caregivers' time spent providing more than 8.5 billion hours of care is estimated to be nearly $234 billion.   Amicus Brain’s AI-led services focus on caregivers and their patients before, during and after diagnosis, and while living with the disease, providing a scalable, cost-effective solution that reduces the caregiver load, raises the standard of current practices in neurodegenerative care and leads to improved health outcomes.

Industry Groups: Apps, Media and Entertainment, Mobile, Sales and Marketing, Software, Video
Description: AnswerStage is an app and cloud-based video processing platform for creating professional-looking videos quickly using the Q&A format.
Full Description: How do you produce professional-looking videos without all of the equipment, time and expense? That's a great question.  Now there's a great answer:  AnswerStage.   All you need is your phone to create videos that you can share anywhere -- your intranet, blog, email, LMS, CMS, customer support, or social networks such as LinkedIn, Twitter, and Facebook.  Here's how it works:  1.  Think of questions that are pertinent to your audience. You type them in the way you'd like them to be presented.   2.  Record answers on your phone.  The AnswerStage app literally "asks" you questions using text-to-speech technology and you record your answer like you're having a video call.  It's that easy.  If you like your answer, just click save.  If you don't like your answer, just re-record it.  You get as many "takes" as you want.   3:  Add captions (if you want).  Your answers are automatically transcribed so you can add captions to your videos.  The AnswerStage app includes a simple while-you-watch tool for reviewing and editing captions so you can be sure that they're accurate and synchronized properly.  4: Use the AnswerStage Studio to combine your answers into an "interview" and pick a template for how you want the final video to look.  The options include animated introductions, titles, transitions and your contact information presented alongside of your answers.  All of the magic happens in the AnswerStage cloud-based production platform.  5. Share your video.  You're in complete control of where it gets distributed whether you just want to share it with friends, or colleagues, or post on social networks to maximize views.  Video is the new must-have for content creators and AnswerStage is best way to create videos that are helpful, interesting, timely and cost effective. And more importantly, AnswerStage leverages your most valuable asset -- your expertise and personality.   Features include: - enter and edit questions that you know are pertinent and helpful to your audience. - record answers anytime, anywhere. - re-record or do "retakes" of any answer. - keep an archive of answers to be used multiple times and combined in different ways for different audiences. - choose from dozens of templates, backgrounds, titles, and animations that make your video look great - add captions to your video with automatic transcriptions and an easy-to-use captions editor.  - choose to produce your video with just the audio of your answers with the "radiowave" template.  (Perfect for when there's bad lighting, distractions or just a bad hair day,) - Share to just the audience you want -- one-on-one with a prospect, with only people in your company, or with everyone in the world through services like LinkedIn, Facebook and Twitter.

They’ve closed more mobile app deals than any other brokers and have quickly become the premier go-to team for sellers and buyers. Things move fast in this space and they’re no different. They’ve closed deals in as little as 2 weeks and their focus is one thing, helping you buy or sell a mobile APP business. Not looking to buy or sell an APP business? No problem. They started out focused on Internet based businesses and that’s where their roots lie. So they can help you buy or sell an Internet business even if it’s NOT related to mobile applications. Buyers love us because they don’t accept just any listing. ALL of their listings must meet some very basic criteria that buyers are looking for and they’re happy to go over your business/app portfolio/technology with you and shine it up. They’ve been doing this awhile and can normally spot simple things to increase the real value of the business for buyers and sellers. And while they don’t accept all listings, app related or not, if your business meets some very basic criteria, they’re confident they can get you a serious offer from one of their many pre-qualified buyers.

Description: Artifex Software Inc. is the trusted developer of Ghostscript, MuPDF, and SmartOffice technologies.
Full Description: For over 25 years Artifex Software has provided premier document management solutions to top-level global customers. Artifex technologies are used to drive products and services as varied as printers, cloud and SaaS solutions, mobile devices, and embedded electronic devices.  Ghostscript is the #1 PDL conversion tool available today, offering native rendering and conversion of all major page description languages (PDF, PostScript, PCL, and XPS) to raster and vector files, as well as ASCII text. Ghostscript is the most flexible and robust print/conversion/rendering solution on the market. Trust Ghostscript to deliver consistently accurate color and extraordinary print quality on every project. MuPDF is an ultra-small, ultra-fast, highly versatile, and customizable PDF and XPS interpreter solution that can be used across a wide range of applications as a PDF renderer, viewer, or toolkit. The tiny footprint and lightning-fast performance make MuPDF a perfect fit for mobile browsers, eBooks, and embedded applications where small size is key. SmartOffice is a lightweight and easy-to-use mobile document productivity suite. View, edit, create, print, present and share Microsoft Office and PDF documents via your mobile device. SmartOffice has been designed to provide an intuitive easy-to-use mobile workflow, perfect for today’s on-the-go world.

Description: Arxan is the trusted global leader of application protection and management products for IoT, Mobile, and other applications.
Full Description: Arxan, a global trusted leader providing the industry’s most comprehensive application protection solutions, works with organizations looking to protect critical applications that deployed “into the wild.” Arxan currently protects more than one billion application instances across many industries including financial services, mobile payments, healthcare,automotive, gaming, and entertainment. Unlike legacy security providers that relying on perimeter-based barriers to keep bad actors out or that require device management controls, Arxan products protect at the application-level from the inside out. This approach protects the source and binary code to expand the corporate perimeter of trust. Arxan provides a broad range of patented security capabilities such as a dynamic app policy engine, code hardening, obfuscation, white-box cryptography and encryption, and threat analytics.

Description: Asignio is a group of passionate people dedicated to making the world more secure without making it more complicated.
Full Description: Asignio was formed to radically simplify and improve how we sign-in and authorize apps, websites, and services. Based on our proprietary signature/handwriting-based technology, the Asignio mobile authentication platform provides a quick, easy-to-use, and secure way for users to sign-in. A user's Asignio Signature can be any set of letters (like their initials), symbols, or a drawing - easier to remember than a password, quick to draw on the mobile touch-screen, yet extremely difficult for others to reproduce. The Asignio platform increases security, lowers fraud risk, and significantly reduces support costs while providing consumers a better experience. Located in the beautiful Pacific Northwest, Asignio is a growing company that has brought together diverse talents to accomplish a single goal: improve authentication for users and developers. Asignio possesses expertise in security, business processes, software development, and user interface design. We have combined these strengths to create a better way to sign in.

Description: Asset Panda is a highly configurable asset tracking and management platform that makes it easy for your entire organization to work smarter.
Full Description: The Asset Panda asset tracking and management platform is the most flexible and customizable system in the industry for tracking and managing your assets. Going beyond fixed asset tracking, Asset Panda optimizes and streamlines everything from auditing to facilities management, equipment support ticketing, compliance, and purchase order management.  Unlike other systems, Asset Panda is highly configurable, so it can become whatever you need it to be, and adjust as your needs change. Asset Panda works the way you do, on devices you’re already using, both online and through their free Mobile App. This makes it easy for all your users to access the information they need, when they need it, from wherever they happen to be working.

Description: AssetSense is delivering the real-time data you need to improve your company's equipment condition monitoring and asset performance .
Full Description: In 2007, the founder of AssetSense started the journey of a lifetime. His goal was to help organizations gain the promise of machine health information systems such as IBM, SAP, or GE without the pains of initial capital expenditure, costly customization, and complex usability issues. He envisioned using 21st-Century technologies to provide these capabilities at a fraction of the cost of large enterprise-wide systems. A team of 25 and about 200,000 hours of R&D produced a beautiful software system that works like iPhone apps on any device, anywhere, any time. They call it AssetSense and it's ready to transform your control over the health and costs of all your mining equipment. Solutions within AssetSense include Performance Dashboards, Real-time Condition Monitoring, Field Mobile Apps, RFID Asset Tracking, Inspections Management, Maintenance, Notifications and Inventory Tracking.

Description: ATLETO is an app that connects everyday athletes. Very simple and intuitive.
Full Description: We are proud to show ATLETO to the world. ATLETO was born out of the frustrations felt by our executive team when it came to connecting with others interested in sporting activities. Currently, everyday athletes don’t have an intuitive way to easily connect with and engage in sports and fitness activities with like minded individuals.  We created a sports app to better connect everyday athletes based on interest, skill level and passion for the same activities. Users can discover other athletes of the same skill level by leveraging a ranking system of ability built into the app. By assigning others “knuckles,” users can rate their fellow athletes based on level of sportsmanship and physical capability. This allows users to engage comfortably and without fear of being outmatched. Users can either host or find sporting activities across 40 sports including basketball, cycling, tennis, running and soccer in cities worldwide including launches in Los Angeles, New York and Miami. We are bringing together everyday athletes to connect and grow their network to sport together.    Check it out - we'd love to hear your feedback. For more information visit our website AtletoSports.com and download it for free on iOS.

Description: Auriga is an elite software R&D and IT outsourcing services provider incorporated in the U.S.
Full Description: Auriga is an elite software R&D and IT outsourcing services provider incorporated in the U.S. and operating development centers in the EU (Lithuania, Vilnius) and Russia (Moscow, Saint Petersburg, Nizhny Novgorod, Rostov-on-Don). Auriga is among top 10 outsourcing providers in Eastern Europe and Russia, and a worldwide leader in software R&D, OPD, software testing and QA. Vertical expertise includes high-tech product development, healthcare, telecom, finance, government, mobile, media & entertainment, consumer electronics. The company's vision is based on four "right" elements of an effective business strategy – people, size, engagement models, and culture and communication. Right People – Auriga has put together the best team of professionals committed to delivering real value and effective results. They stand out because of their passion for operational excellence and focus on customer satisfaction, not to mention their profound expertise and years of experience. Right Size – Auriga knows what clients expect and delivers accordingly. The company's size ensures individual approach, flexibility and scalability for purposes of managing clients' projects. Right Models – Auriga secures a high level of flexibility offering a wide range of business models, agile development practices, and advanced risk-reward-based or ‘fixed-price agile’ combinations based on clients' needs. Right Culture and Communication – Auriga has built a communication model without missing links, allowing quick and smooth information exchange within teams and between teams and clients. This vision has earned the company worldwide recognition. Auriga is constantly included in Global Services 100, Global Outsourcing 100 and other global industry ratings. In 2010 Auriga was named by Datamonitor #15 in Top 50 outsourcing vendors list based on customer satisfaction level, ahead of Google, Infosys, Capgemini, BT, Fujitsu and many other top vendors. The client list combines industry majors, leaders in their segments, and innovative start-ups, including Lynx Software Technologies, BroadVision, Dialogic, Yandex, Home Credite, Onmobile and many others.

Description: AwayFind is a web application that sends mobile alerts for urgent emails.
Full Description: AwayFind is a web application that lets you stop checking your inbox every 5 minutes but still allows urgent emails to find you quickly by pushing them right to you with alerts. When there's an urgent email, AwayFind will call, SMS, IM, DM (Twitter), or notify you through iPhone and Android apps. The application lets both individuals and organizations get away from their inboxes without having to worry about missing urgent messages. Whether to get some "real" work done, go to a meeting, or even on vacation, AwayFind makes sure that the urgent messages the user specifies still finds them. AwayFind does not require any installation or learning curve, and it supports all major email platforms including Google Apps/Gmail, Microsoft Exchange, Yahoo Mail, and IMAP. The company has been featured by The New York Times, NPR, TechCrunch, MSNBC, The NY Post, CNET, Gartner, The Guardian, Forbes and many others. AwayFind offers a free basic service in addition to its Pro Plan packages.

Connect to your customer around a physical object or guide them towards a business goal in an unobtrusive way. Whether you are trying to provide additional information for a product, exhibit, promote an event or create a guided experience, bAbsorbed is there to engage your customers. Description: Babyscripts is a clinically validated, digital healthcare company.
Full Description: Babyscripts is a doctor delivered digital health tool that enhances the doctor or patient relationship outside the four walls of the clinic during routine, low-risk pregnancy care. It leverages the full power of technology to elevate the standard of prenatal care. When a patient is enrolled in the program by their OBGYN, they receive our mobile app. The mobile app is a to-do list that guides the mother through each gestation period with practice-specific, provider-approved tasks related to nutrition, exercise, and other behaviors appropriate to pregnancy and specific to the practice. Once an expectant mother sets up her app, a physical box, called the Mommy Kit is delivered to her home, equipped with an internet-enabled weight scale and blood pressure cuff. At least once per week through the app, Babyscripts will remind the patient to use the Internet-enabled devices in order to stay connected with their provider and enhance the provider/patient relationship at home. Those readings, as well as a record of her compliance to the other assigned tasks, are automatically captured and uploaded to her profile on Babyscripts. The use of mobile and connected devices allows both Babyscripts and the provider to create an environment that permits real-time feedback and intervention from the comfort of the patient’s home. Babyscripts is in collaboration with several major health systems to deliver solutions to better manage high-risk pregnancies. Babyscripts is constantly improving upon our product and product offerings, so they can potentially reach every expecting mother all in pursuit of its mission.

Description: Mobile Application Development Platform
Full Description: Backendless is a general-purpose mobile application development platform. It consists of an mBaaS foundation, a web hosting service, API generation engine and a services marketplace. The spectrum of capabilities provided by the Platform suits a wide range of on-premise and cloud-connected apps. This includes multi-channel enterprise apps, location-aware, social, rich media and messaging apps. Using Backendless developers  can focus solely on the user experience and client-side business logic of their applications without worrying about or spending any time on the infrastructure and server-side tasks. Backendless accomplishes this by exposing the core server-side functions as programmable services accessible via specialized and REST APIs. Without any effort, developers can implement app functions for user registration and login, data persistence, push notification, geolocation, publish subscribe messaging and media streaming. Absolutely all default server-side behavior can be modified or extended with custom business logic.

Description: Be-Bound allows everyone using a smartphone to stay connected to the internet.
Full Description: Be-Bound is the new mobile solution to stay connected to the Internet worldwide with your smartphone even with poor or no Internet connection.   Everybody has faced connection issues, even in covered areas like the train, the subway, indoor or any other area with poor connectivity. To solve this issue, Be-Bound has developed an innovative cloud technology using a very low bandwidth that delivers the best user experience even with poor connection. When there is no Wi-Fi or 3G network Be-Bound is using 2G network as transport layer to exchange information between the web and your smartphone, increasing dramatically the internet coverage. The solution works without any infrastructure investment and with any phone carrier in the world.    To access Be-Bound services, the user only needs to download the free Be-Bound app which includes built-in applications for email, weather report, news, stocks quotes, geolocated services and even Twitter. Using Be-Bound is free when connected to the Internet. When there is no data network available, the service works with SMS and prepaid credits (Be-miles) at a fraction of the standard roaming costs.    The Be-Bound vision is to allow everyone using a smartphone to stay connected as part of the next mobile revolution.    With Be-Bound, STAY CONNECTED… NOW!

Full Description: Beevrhood is an internet software company based in Houston, Texas. Our goal is to create new social experiences in our neighborhood communities with our just released private social application for neighbors called "Beevr".   Beevr was created from scratch for one main purpose, building a better future for our families and we believe we can do it by bringing back the sense of community in our neighborhoods. That is why we have carefully crafted our app Beevr, to make every day's life activities within those communities easier, safer, and more enjoyable than ever before; by providing a unique collaborative experience that will break the barriers of communication and interaction but most of all, that provides an experience that invite and enhance innovation from neighbors so they can find new solutions and opportunities and at the end enhance their life.  At the same time, for us the user's Privacy is our top concern, that's why we work hard to earn and keep their trust. For that reason want to give full Privacy control with the neighbors so the users can decide at any moment how they want to connect and with whom.  We also adhere the following guarantees to protect the user's privacy:     1) We will never rent or sell personal information to third parties for marketing purposes.    2) We will never share a user's personal information with another user, unless both of them choose to contact one another.    3) All the information is encrypted, all the information will be secured with industry standard technology.  The app is free and is available in Mexico and the US. We hope you will like it! If you have a general question about the company, send an email to: contact@beevrhood.com or send us a message via Facebook.

Description: Bestmap is an aggregator of all mobility and transportation providers in one app.
Full Description: Bestmap is an aggregator of all transportation incl e-scooters, bikes, metro, busses, trains, rental cars, mopeds, flights, and more in one app. Bestmap envisions a time when, for the first time, urbanists and travelers will be able to use one app to find all mobility companies on the map that operate in the city, book tickets for the bus, train, airplane, self-driving cars, and have cool features, all on the same itinerary. We use a win-win strategy when mobility partners-clients and the department of transportation in different cities share data, and users can use data from that company via the Bestmap app. Bestmap also provides an analytics platform for mobility providers and transportation authorities. Businesses and Transportation authorities want to know when, where, and why people use their transport (bikes, busses, airplanes...), they want to know where people fly or drive, transportation authorities want to improve the local transportation system. All of them spend billions of dollars on improving the transportation system, getting more users, and growing the company.  Instead of asking local people, buy tickets at the station, use different maps to find routes, find bus routes, electric chargers, gas station prices or find parking in the city, users can contribute and edit it in the app.  We are looking forward to collaborating with companies, transportation authorities and allow people to know how to get from point A to B faster, cheaper, safer anywhere in the world!

Description: Mobile digital therapeutics platform company creating a new approach to headache and migraine prevention and management.
Full Description: BioTrak is digital therapeutics platform company with smartphone products which deliver evidence-based, preventative treatment of stress-related disorders such as migraine, multiple sclerosis, depression, chronic pain, and anxiety. The first of a series of products is Ease: Headache and Migraine™, which was launched  Q1’ 19. Three (3) billion people worldwide suffer from severe tension-type headaches and migraine. Ease, which delivers clinically-tested behavioral interventions on a mobile platform, is superior in clinical effectiveness, safety, cost, and convenience compared to the most advanced migraine drugs. Ease is positioned to be used either alone or adjunctively with conventional drug therapies. Ease: Headache & Migraine™ is digital therapeutic app that delivers clinically-proven, effective behavioral therapy. Ease has been shown to be as effective as in-office treatment, resulting in 60% reduction in headache frequency and disability. Ease is a brand new approach to addressing the severely unmet need for a scalable, affordable, safe and effective treatment option for the estimated 3 billion people who suffer from tension headache and migraine worldwide.

Description: Birdpost offers an online platform that enables individuals to organize, map, and share their collective birding activities.
Full Description: Birdpost is poised to lead a burgeoning "citizen science" movement as a usable, innovative, and potent framework aimed at connecting nature and people in ways never before possible. Birdpost combines satellite mapping technology with the popular sport of birdwatching, dramatically modernizing, improving, and altering the hobby by solving birders' most vexing problem: where to find new bird species. Birdpost gives the estimated 18 million serious U.S. birders an online platform to chronicle, organize, map, and share their collective birding activities. The cumulative data gathered by Birdpost's users will produce "natural histories" of local habitats and give conservationists, educators, and other nature enthusiasts the tools they need to better protect, understand, and the enjoy the environment. Ultimately, Birdpost's proprietary vehicle for grass-roots nature reporting will scale beyond birds to include other nature verticals such as wildlife, insects, reptiles, plants, fish, and trees, becoming a human-generated nature search engine.

Industries: Advice, Information Technology, Internet, Internet of Things, Mobile, Mobile Apps, Software
Industry Groups: Apps, Information Technology, Internet Services, Media and Entertainment, Mobile, Software
Description: Biz of IT Innovations is the best Open Innovation Platform for Enterprises and Technology companies. The Mobile app is called Innovation HQ.
Full Description: Bizofit (pronounced Biz of IT) is the best Open Innovation Platform for Enterprises and Technology companies. The Mobile Innovation Platform is called "Innovation HQ". 'IT' in 'Biz of IT' does not stand for Information Technology; it stands for "Innovation & Transformation". Bizofit's Open Innovation platform enables enterprises to discover and connect with startups on a "globally curated" platform. The platform also helps enterprises and startups to collaborate and build solutions. Via Bizofit / Innovation HQ platform, Enterprises post Innovation Challenges and Business Problems and crowdsource Ideas and Innovative solutions. Tech companies use the platform to reach CXOs and generate "Digital" Leads. The platform is designed to help Enterprise CXOs crowdsource Innovative Ideas and Solutions, and to operationalize Ideation and Innovation. Focus areas are Digital Technologies, but the Platform can be really used in any organization to seek and submit ideas / solutions.  Employees, ecosystem partners i.e. customers or vendors, or anyone can send you ideas and solutions, depending on your preferences. Every user is validated through his/her LinkedIn profile. The Technology companies on the Platform are curated, and Ideas and Solutions are vetted. Tech companies can use the Platform to generate Leads, if Enterprises are interested in their Ideas / Solutions. Several cool features like 'Like', Thumbs down, Forward and Replies are included. Some of the upcoming features include Rating of Ideas, and much more. Other features include the ability to Identify, Evaluate, and Select Technology Solutions through our proprietary 4P SUGAR Quadrant Framework. SUGAR stands for "Specialized User Generated Aggregate Rating". Only Customers and Analysts rate companies and solutions on the Platform. Bizofit was launched by IT Services industry veteran Bala Palamadai to disrupt the Technology space, by challenging the Status Quo – based on Legacy sourcing approaches, Legacy Service Providers and Legacy engagement models – that resulted in sub-optimal solutions, huge costs and limited adoption of Transformational solutions in several organizations. Identifying a new Technology vendor takes up to nine months – an unacceptably high time frame in today’s world. Also, a little-known fact is that new customer acquisition often costs as high as 20-30% of revenues for IT Service Providers, a cost which ultimately is borne by Enterprise Customers.  Through adoption of its Platform, Bizofit seeks to eliminate these inefficiencies and reduce costs, and most importantly present Enterprises with Transformational & Innovative Digital Solutions. Ideate & Innovate! Keywords: Open Innovation, Crowdsource, Ideas, Ideate, Innovate, Innovation, Innovation Pipeline, Post Challenge, Post Solution, Digital Solutions, Technology solutions, Social, Mobility, Analytics, Cloud, VR, IoT, Bots, Blockchain

Full Description: At BlackBird, we believe that driving shouldn’t be the only option for personal transportation. Over the last fifty years we’ve lost the freedom and endless possibility that cars used to represent and simply accepted traffic and the limitations of driving as a way of life. In fact, we view the world through a car-centric lens, choosing where we live and work based on how long driving between them will take. We limit our weekend trips based on how long it will take to drive there and back.   No matter who you are, no matter what you do, we all face challenges, obstacles, rules, limitations and frustrations—this daily struggle is gravity that pulls us down and tries to keep us from reaching our potential. Description: Blendr is a geo-social networking application and social discovery platform for Android, iPhone, iPod touch, iPad and Facebook.
Full Description: Launched in September 2011, Blendr is the ultimate social compass for individuals seeking to strike conversations with new people nearby and check out what’s happening at surrounding venues in the moment. The free location-based mobile app, available on the iPhone, iPad and iPod touch, empowers users to make new social connections with those nearby who share similar interests, have a common background or like to go to the same places. Offering many of the same features, Blendr is also available as a Facebook app (www.Blendr.com/FacebookApp), enabling Facebook users to connect with the full Blendr network. Unlike other social networks that connect users to people they already know, Blendr takes advantage of award-winning proprietary technology and real-time functionality to intelligently unite users looking for ways to discover new people rooted in common pursuits and pastimes. Blendr uses location-based technology found on smartphones to determine a user’s location and connect them with those with shared interests. To get started, simply download the app, rich in privacy settings and features, which puts the user in total control of their personal information, whereabouts and how they want to interact with new people. Then, create a profile by uploading a photo and selecting profile details and interests, including the interests of those the user would like to meet. From there, let the discovery of new people and new places begin!

Description: Bliss is a startup company which will provide ecommerce through a new mobile application.
Full Description: Bliss is a startup company which will provide ecommerce through a new mobile application. It is modeled after the successful ""Uber"" concept of bringing disparate consumers together with disparate service providers. The target service is the burgeoning massage industry, an $11.8 billion sector with approximately 325,000 licensed providers and 39 million consumers, nationwide. Seventy (70%) of massage services are now performed without the benefit of a retail store or institutional location. Providers and consumers use ad-hoc methods of finding one another through word-of-mouth, thousands of micro websites, small scale networking, promotion and advertising. The disparate nature of both providers and consumers is begging for the organizational structure that Bliss will offer. Bliss will provide an organized and convenient way for providers and consumers to find each other, make and receive payments and insure quality. Bliss not only connects the network of providers and consumers but also virtually assures that consumers will find a qualified, licensed massage professional anywhere, anytime by bringing Uber-style participation to market.    The massage services sector is growing rapidly in conjunction with the aging US population and growing consumer awareness of the therapeutic benefits of massage. The convenience and robust networking capacity that Bliss offers has virtually no competition. Now is the time to organize this sector, help the market connect and enjoy the entrepreneurial reward that comes with it.

The idea was to reduce friction and make it as simple for the end user as possible. Employees can punch in from any web connected device and you can monitor their time online.  We have an admin dashboard to see who's currently working as well as their full time card data.

Description: Easily Invest Your Spare Change Into Cryptocurrency
Full Description: Most people want to cultivate a habit of saving and investing, but very few people actually get around to doing it. The public is very interested in cryptocurrency, but it is difficult for the average person to understand the intricacies of investing in cryptocurrency and where to start. We believe the best way to get started with investing in cryptocurrency is by micro-investing. Our team has designed a platform that enables users to invest in cryptocurrencies and other financial tools using their spare change from each of their every day transactions. Bundil is an automated micro-investing platform where users can invest in a cryptocurrency of their choice using their spare change from purchases by rounding off their transactions to the nearest dollar.

Description: Calabria Technology is a California based technology consulting and IT Professional Services Company.
Full Description: Calabria Technology is a California based technology consulting and IT Professional Services Company. We design, develop, and implement custom websites, web services, enterprise and mobile applications, database management and emerging technology solutions with a core focus on project management, technical expertise, and integration of information technology. Since our inception, Calabria Technology has developed a solid reputation as a valued, quality-driven technology partner servicing organizations worldwide. We pride ourselves in providing end-to-end, industry-specific technology solutions tuned precisely to meet the needs of today’s complex, secure, and transaction-driven requirements. Through our core focus of innovative technology solutions we are committed to providing value to our customers through creative, secure, cost-effective solutions. We have built websites from simple to extreme. Our technology development and design teams are proficient in web development including Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP, Java, JavaScript, WordPress, Joomla, Ruby on Rails, .Net, CSS, Flash and other web 2.0 technology platforms. We have built websites with links to Facebook, Twitter and other social media sites, and websites which process secure credit card transactions and online commerce. In many cases we have built mobile applications syncing to the website to manage online transaction processing. We have built websites with a secure database server to manage data, transactions, commerce, and links to PayPal, credit card or 3rd-party payment transaction services. Many of the websites we build have Content Management Systems (CMS) back end for easy real time edits and simple content management. We have built mobile applications for IPhone, IPad, Blackberry, Android, Palm, Nokia, Symbian, Java and Windows mobile platforms. We also can port an application from one mobile platform to another. We have built mobile apps with links to Facebook, Twitter and other social media sites, and apps that manage web services to process mobile or online credit card transactions. We have no limits when it comes to creative design, application development and functionality. Our mobile app design team will work with your application vision team to create the perfect app. If needed, we can sync your mobile application, website and content management system (CMS) with your secure database server to manage data, transactions, commerce, and links to a payment gateway for secure Cloud Computing. We have no limits when it comes to creative design, application development, and functionality.

Industries: Advertising, Coupons, E-Commerce, Mobile, Mobile Apps
Industry Groups: Advertising, Apps, Commerce and Shopping, Mobile, Sales and Marketing, Software
Description: Coupon Management System for Business
Full Description: FORT LAUDERDALE, FL, July 15, 2013 – CashOff announced today the beta launch of its Coupon Management System for Businesses.  The web based application allows a business to make a coupon in minutes and then distribute it via email, print or on social networks like Facebook, Twitter and Instagram.  Unlike Groupon and the other daily deal sites, which keep up to 50% of the revenue of any "deal" offered by a merchant,  CashOff.com offers its coupon management system for as little as $10 per month without any revenue sharing whatsoever.   A recent report from Juniper Research suggests that the mobile coupon market will be worth $46 billion by 2015, a large jump from the $5.6 billion projected for the industry this year. In this day and age, consumers expect there to be deals when they go shopping, but most small businesses cannot afford the revenue sharing percentages the daily deal sites require and so they end up losing consumers to other companies that buy into the game.  Because of its low cost and marketing effectiveness, CashOff appeals to every business and has already started to go viral.  CashOff is currently offering a Free 12 Month Trial to its first 1,000 users.   The Company had a soft launch without formal announcement several days ago and the user sign ups have already far exceeded the Company's expectations.   “Within five days of going live, not only have small businesses across the country started to use our System, but we also signed up a restaurant that is part of a billion dollar national food chain,” according to Brian  Thomas, Founder, Chief Noise Maker and CEO. “30 years ago, I grew up in a family with so little money that if it were not for coupons I wouldn't be alive!   We think CashOff represents a game changer in the five billion dollar coupon space and we are excited to provide an affordable service that supports local economies.  My Mother Would be Proud of Me”.  About CashOff Inc.  CashOff is a cloud-based Coupon Management System that enables merchants to create and manage professional looking digital or mobile coupons with ease.  The CashOffs are the digital equivalent of traditional coupons but specifically designed to be used in emails, on websites and on social networks including Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and others.      Contact: Brian Thomas, Founder, CEO and Chief Noise Maker http://www.CashOff.com

Description: We design and code products for non-technical businesses from concept to launch. Think of us not as your agency, but your technical partner.
Full Description: Since 2009, we have helped create over 200+ web and mobile apps for startups, Fortune 500s, growing businesses, and non-profits from around the globe. We apply your idea and vision with our own expertise to turn it into something real: Some clients that reach out to us already have a comprehensive plan of what form they want their product to take. Others still need help figuring out if their idea should take the form of a mobile app, web app, or something else entirely. It’s our job to guide our clients towards applying their vision to the best technological match possible.  Mobile App Development: We have dedicated teams that are capable of building the latest app indexing-compliant products for the iPhone, iPad, and Android. Our goal is to create an app for you that has a commanding presence on both the iOS App Store and the Google Play Store.   Web App Development: Successful web apps need to have a frontend that excites users and functions properly on all devices. But what makes a web app that is durable for the long term? A user-friendly and reliable backend that clients can use to manage and scale.  Non-Functional Prototypes For Mobile/Web Apps: Not every business can afford the initial investment required for a market-ready app. So we offer to make you a non-functioning prototype. Prototyping can demonstrate your idea’s potential to investors, customers, crowd-funders. Minimum Viable Products For Mobile/Web Apps: MVPs are a complete, entry-level (but market-ready) product to your audience that lets you earn real revenue from the get-go. All design services are carried over from prototyping.

Description: ChumMe is the first free, exclusively platonic app for making friends and meeting people - with no underlying romantic agenda!
Full Description: ChumMe is the first free, exclusively platonic app for making friends and meeting people. Most apps are thinly veiled dating apps, even though they may not be billed as dating apps. ChumMe is an app for making friends. It is not easy to make new friends, especially in today’s ever so busy pace. People work longer, harder, and move to new cities in greater numbers. Not everyone is into a the bar/club scene and even if they are, are they really meeting quality people after a few drinks? Transplants new to a city may find it tough to meet people. Individuals who are self-employed or work from home have no outlets to make new friends through employment. Career oriented people are often “too busy” to make friends. Do we need to mention how tough it is to make friends when you have kids? There are also people who are tired of their friends or have outgrown their friends. Perhaps your partner in crime has moved away to another city. Wouldn’t it be nice to weed through people who may not be a good fit for you - platonically, speaking, that is - from the comfort of your own home? ChumMe helps solve the problem of meeting new people - with no underlying romantic agenda!

Description: Cimbal is a mobile promotion and payment network designed to increase business sales and deliver deals to consumers.
Full Description: CimbalÂ® is a software driven promotion, payment and social CRM network.  Promotions are easily created by merchants and targeted to individuals via the mobile channel.  Consumers launch a Cimbal app on their mobile device to see local deals and capture by scanning a 2D code created by Cimbal's system.  Core to Cimbal is authentication - verifying who the user is as well as their check-in for deal capture and payment.  Best of all, Cimbal can be used in-store, online and person to person, in a simple, consistent manner mitigating card-not-present fraud and chargeback concerns.  Cimbal is entirely software based so no new terminal or card reader hardware is required, allowing parties to get more utility out of their existing technology investment, promoting faster consumer adoption and easier deployment by merchants.   Consumers benefit from the increased convenience and security of paying from their smartphone. Merchants benefit from considerably lower processing costs and brand loyalty programs. Banks benefit from an easy-to-use mobile payment solution that lowers customer acquisition costs and securely links to a customerâ€™s direct deposit account. And everyone benefits from Cimbalâ€™s increased security protocols which eliminate fraud, charge backs and identity theft risk. Cimbal, the smart way to pay.Â® Cimbal is headquartered in Silicon Valley, California and is privately held.

Industries: Artificial Intelligence, Big Data, Employee Benefits, Financial Services, FinTech, Lifestyle, Mobile Apps, Personal Finance, Software

Description: Comprehensive personal financial manager and intelligence platform.
Full Description: Cinch is your personal, always-on, always-loyal CFO.  Our goal is to take care of your financial life and manage it for you – holistically, and all in one place.  All the hard, painful stuff most people hate we will handle for you with only your financial health in mind.   We do this through our intelligence platform that will drive autonomous personal finance – the software that acts as an always-on fiduciary agent across your entire financial life in one single package and across all your financial accounts.   We use innovative technology and behavioral science to optimize financial decisions of any size – from how much to save each month, to the best path out of credit card debt, to making sure you never overpay for car insurance (or any financial product) ever again.   We’re starting with your everyday finances – your debts, savings, day-to-day cash flow, insurance, and large monthly bills – and then turning to your big goals like buying a home, large future expenses, and retirement savings. By starting with the “today” money decisions, the future begins to take care of itself.   And we will be there as your life, and all the financial products out there, change.   Technology has made it so that you can manage your entire life between 5-6 apps on your phone, but personal finance hasn’t caught up. That’s where Cinch comes in – it’s a comprehensive, holistic, and totally unbiased platform that has only your financial health in mind.

Description: Civic Connect develops and distributes cloud-based technology solutions for civic organizations.
Full Description: Our Mission Enable cities “as enterprises” to improve efficiency and sustainability while providing citizens, visitors and workers the tools they need to more easily explore and navigate their cities. Our Offering CivicConnect provides a suite of applications that leverage Augmented Reality (AR) and the latest mobile technologies to deliver a compelling user experience. With an initial focus on urban mobility, these applications are built on the CivicConnect Platform, a cloud-based platform, purpose-built for the public sector, that enables rapid deployment while providing the data and analytics needed to make smart decisions. Developers can use the platform and growing set of APIs to create their own Smart City applications. Our History CivicConnect, formerly Civic Resource Group, brings 15 years’ experience delivering digital solutions and services to the Public Sector. With customers across sectors and agency levels, CivicConnect has a deep understanding of the needs, resources and priorities of this sector, and harnesses this knowledge and expertise as we continue to build our CivicConnect Platform and applications. Our Focus As the urban population grows and the populace relies on single passenger trips, congestion increases, and the staggering economic and environmental consequences from this congestion demands alternatives. Public Sector entities must find timely and cost-effective ways to tackle the challenges of urban mobility to ensure sustainable, economically viable cities. Today, CivicConnect provides our integrated data management platform, AR based applications and intelligence for delivering urban mobility solutions. Over time, the CivicConnect data management platform and applications will grow to address all aspects of a connected Smart City.

Description: Cleaning Service
Full Description: Here’s How it Works? 1.	Customers can register for a profile in the app. They can upload their profile picture, contact information, pictures of their home or neighborhood. A customer can safe, and securely keep a credit card on file.  2.	The customer will use the GPS pinpoint mapping and location features to set their cleaning location. They can see on the GPS all available local cleanosaur professionals. They set their request details and price. They confirm and send the notification out to all online cleaning professionals.  3.	The cleaning professionals receive the details of the job, and accept the opportunity to clean your home. The customer can see who has accepted their clean request; review their profile picture, A Nice to Meet You introduction video, their ratings and reviews, contact information. The customer can use the app the chat about the clean, or call the cleaner to finalize job details. 4.	The cleaner comes to the customer’s home, with location tracking and estimated time of arrival per the set date and time. The cleaners perform all the cleaning request details, and confirms complete in the app.  5.	The customer payment is released to the cleaning professional. The customer can also provide a rating, review of all cleaning jobs completed. They can view the work order history of the cleaner, and their own work order history. Use this app to completely manage the cleaning of your home.

Description: Clever Sense offers “Alfred,” a mobile app delivering personalized recommendations for nearby restaurants, coffee shops, and nightclubs.
Full Description: The Clever Sense Platform makes sense of the real world by harvesting and sifting through the vast amount of information available on the Web. The platform is designed to connect the online world with the offline world: delivering the right information to the users in the right context (right time, right place, right intent). At the heart of the Clever Sense Platform is the Serendipity Engine: a personalized context-aware right-time discovery engine. The Serendipity Engine adds a layer of real-time machine learning algorithms and intelligent agent architecture on top of the Clever Sense Interest Graph. It goes beyond traditional recommendation engines by incorporating user's anonymous interest profile and current context (time, location, intent, and social context) into curation of its recommendations. The Alfred mobile app is a personal concierge who provides high-quality recommendations from the start. Coming soon for iOS devices, Alfred recommends places that will truly shine for users, based on what he learns about their personal tastes and his extensive knowledge from the general web. Alfred, who has been called "Pandora for the real world", provides increasingly fine-tuned suggestions, personalized to the location, time, and person. Clever Sense was founded by two Stanford Engineering graduates in 2008. Our technical advisory includes Prof. Jeff Ullman (Sergey Brin's former advisor at Stanford) and Sep Kamvar (creator of Google's Personalized Search).

Industries: Analytics, Internet of Things, Lifestyle, Mobile Apps

Description: ClickDate is an experience based match making system.
Full Description: ClickDate project is conceptually new approach in matching people to help them find the love of their life.  The name, “Click Date” itself symbolizes the idea behind our project, which is – identification of user preferences based on the analyzes of his/her behavior. This is modern approach to psychology called behaviorism. By Nature of our model actually we are not just a dating website, and also we are not matchmaking based on the 100+ questions and matching psychological model of persons, we take more natural, real live approach, which is based on your daily live experience, your eye first contact, your passion and your behavior. We are using every minute of your experience spent on our site to suggest better partners. And we do, unlike the other matchmaking sites where you should wait a day to get a few more new matches, our system are able to generate new and better match right in time you are using it. Unless other matchmaking systems models are best of matching users based on the chemistry which they tend to understand from questions users answers (correctly or not), or trying to match people with other social similarities, we are looking deep into person subconscious, and analyzing what his/her heart and brain looking for, but not laying based on the questions the person answers consciously, logically and to impersonate person he/she wish to be. But even if they do that, the approach does not work like this in real life. We are not looking for partners who are the 100 percent similar to us. We are looking for love, for positive differences and traits that complement our own. The purpose of relationship is to complement each other.

CloudSight has two breakthrough consumer apps - CamFind, the world's first successful mobile visual search engine that allows you to "Search the Physical World" and find information about anything just by taking a picture from your mobile device; and TapTapSee, an app for the blind and visually impaired that utilizes a mobile device's camera and VoiceOver to photograph and record objects to identify them out loud for the user. CloudSight Inc. was founded in 2012 and is based in Los Angeles, CA.

Description: Smarter Relationship Management. The no-work way to see everything about your contacts in one place.
Full Description: Cloze is like a personal assistant for your professional relationships that is always prompting you at the right moment and remembering what you don’t. It pulls from your apps to automatically create one view of every person and company - all their contact details, and your complete history - every email back and forth, your phone calls together, your meetings, your notes on Evernote, documents you exchanged and your interactions on LinkedIn, Facebook, and Twitter. We’ll even grab email signatures so your contacts are always up-to-date. It's all organized for you - by contact, company and meeting - without any busy work. With everything in one place, Cloze can put advanced data science to work for you.
