Cloze organizes by companies too - without any setup. There’s no data entry - Cloze is the automatic way to remember everyone.

Description: COACHD provides membership to 24-7 one-on-one personal health and fitness coaching via smartphone, tablet, or desktop.
Full Description: Online personal training and nutrition guidance is currently the most sought-after business solution in the fitness and health industries. No single company has figured out how to deliver online personal training to the end user while at the same time creating the right lifestyle brand to attract users and scale. We solve this problem.   COACHD provides personal training and nutrition guidance via smartphone, tablet, or desktop with elite coaches, where anyone (over the age of 13) can get help from a certified professional without traveling to a brick and mortar gym or office for their guidance.  The app is available on iPhone and Android.  Clients are paired with a COACHD fitness and/or nutrition professional by a customer success specialist or can select one from several suggested by a matching algorithm.  Fitness and nutrition programs offered by coaches include National Academy of Sports Medicine (NASM) based training and other scientifically supported training and nutrition programs. The platform works via unlimited messaging where fitness professionals respond one to three times per day, and conversations are seamless across devices.  The same privacy rules governing clients’ confidentiality and protection exist as in brick and mortar training.   All fitness professionals are certified, have personal training business insurance, and screening involves background-checks, technical and service training, and interviews. Similar to brick and mortar fitness, clients work with their trainer in a structured environment to set goals and work through health and fitness challenges.  Goals are continually assessed and clients play an active role in their fitness journey by providing feedback to their coach. COACHD is a monthly subscription service with several tiered options for training and guidance, all of which are significantly less expensive than equivalent in-person training.

Industries: Mobile Apps, Software
Industry Groups: Apps, Mobile, Software
Description: CompanyTRAK uses true Contact Tracing and Social Distancing, helping companies bring employees back to work in a safe environment.
Full Description: Built from the ground up to be a true Contact Tracing, Social Distancing solution, CompanyTRAK uses patent pending technology to follow and log interaction of employees.  Mobile location services (GPS) and BLE technologies, Bluetooth (BT) tags and locators and/or Ultra-Wideband (UWB) devices. Our enterprise platform includes the following solutions through web and mobile applications, Bluetooth locators, tags and UWB wearables: 1. Daily Employee Health Questionnaire 2. Contact Tracing 3. Social Distancing 4. Visitor Questionnaire & Tracing System 5. CT Portal – Corporate Admin & Reporting CompanyTRAK traces primary exposure and notifies employees and assigned HR/Admin when another employee that they have been in contact with self-reports with symptoms or with positive test results. Employees start the day with their Daily Questionnaire prior to entering the building.  All submitted info is sent to HR/Admin in the CT Portal.  As employees enter the Geofenced building, the solution starts tracing their interaction with other employees.  If they come within the 6-foot proximity of each other, they are alerted through LED lights and vibration, and their contact is logged in the CT Portal.  If any of their contacts report symptoms or a positive test result in the next 14-18 days, a notification is sent to them and HR/Admin about a possible risk of exposure.   HR/Admins have access to the CT Portal through various roles.  This helps authorized personnel to manage employees with their Daily PPE/Questionnaire and temperature checks that employees need to follow. HR/Admins are provided access to maintain and edit employees, locations, equipment, and reporting.  Authorized HR/Admins will have access to edit the status of employees.  If an employee recovers from the virus, HR/Admin has the ability to reset their status to Safe after receiving their updated test results. All of this is controlled through integration and APIs in the CT Portal.  From customizing the mobile app and extension URLs, to running reports on employee surveys and status, the CT Portal provide HR and Admins the ability to manage their companies and minimize possible risk of exposure within their employee base.

Industries: Android, Apps, Automotive, Autonomous Vehicles, iOS, Mapping Services, Mobile Apps, Navigation, Transportation

Description: Connected Signals is an innovative startup in the connected car space that delivers real-time, predictive traffic signal data.
Full Description: Connected Signals, Inc. is an innovative startup in the connected car space that delivers real-time, predictive traffic signal data. Their engineers have developed sophisticated techniques to predict upcoming signal states. Knowing the current state of traffic lights and how they will change creates opportunities to increase driving safety, increase fuel efficiency, and improve the driving experience. Applications range from EnLighten, which tells drivers when the light they are stopped at will turn green, to vehicle powertrain optimization based on the state of upcoming lights. Safety is their number one priority. They alert drivers to possible dangers without distracting them. For example, EnLighten tells drivers stopped at red lights whether they have time to catch their breath for a few seconds, change the radio station, or pick up the papers that fell on the floor. EnLighten waits until the car stops, so the driver is not distracted, then announces how long the light will be red and gives a visual countdown. A few seconds before the light turns green, an alert sounds to tell the driver to focus on to the road. Another service They are developing warns drivers when they, or another connected vehicle, are about to run a red light. They partner with municipalities, handling the complexities of gathering real-time signal data and making it available in consistent formats for a variety of uses. Unlike other connected-vehicle technologies, their approach requires neither costly municipal infrastructure investments nor the addition of dedicated hardware to every vehicle. They communicate securely with existing traffic-signal infrastructure, and handle translation of different manufacturers' signal data to a common format.

Description: Mobile app that helps couples strengthen their bond.
Full Description: Are you in a relationship and want to strengthen the bond with your partner? Backed by scientific research, Couple helps you build a bond with your love one by sharing appreciations and shared memories. Whether you've just started dating, preparing for the wedding or maybe you're already married - couple helps you building long-lasting relationship filled with love. * Research says that couples who share appreciations with their partner strengthen their bond * Spending time together each day is important in building relationship. Whether it's watching TV, talking or having sex - it's important to build shared memories every day. * Couple is a fun way to keep track of your relationship. Each day your goal is to close love-rings by appreciating your partner and spending some time together. * Perfect for couples, marriages and love relationships * Share your location and automatically track how much time you spend together with your love one. How relationship problems arise and how to prevent them? Dr. John Gottman, an american psychological, advises in his book about building long-lasting marriage to build a habit of thinking positively about your partner: "If you are angry, stressed, or feeling distant from your spouse, you may tend to focus on his or her negative characteristics. This leads to distress- maintaining thoughts, which in turn leave you feeling ever more distant and isolated in your marriage." Couple is here to help you build that important habit.

Industries: Creative Agency, Mobile Apps, Web Development

Description: Crossfield is a digital agency that provides web and mobile software development, creative, and product strategy services.
Full Description: Crossfield is a digital agency that provides web and mobile software development, creative and product strategy services. THE BEGINNING Crossfield began as a mobile gaming start-up called PrePlay, which developed web and mobile applications that enabled sports fans to make predictions about every play of every game.   PrePlay was the #1 live sports prediction game from 2010-2015 and spanned across professional baseball, football, hockey and tennis.  Over that time, our users made over 50 million predictions across all of our applications. JOINING A NEW TEAM PrePlay was acquired by FanVision Entertainment (FVE) in September of 2014.  FVE added PrePlay’s management and software expertise to further deliver on its mission to enhance the spectator experience. THE TRANSITION FanVision Entertainment is one of a portfolio of companies within the Related Sports and Entertainment (RSE) Ventures family of companies.  When sister company Relevent Sports, the operators of the International Champions Cup, called us about developing their new website, the transition from mobile gaming experts to work-for-hire software development agency began. A NEW NAME After launching the International Champions Cup site and signing Bleacher Report as a partner for its March Madness Bracket Challenge Game, we set out to rebrand the agency to reflect our broader range of capabilities.   Prediction gaming (including live prediction, bracket and streak games) remains a core competency, but we built a team that has decades of combined creative, development and digital strategy experience that spans far beyond gaming.  PrePlay as a self-published product was shut down, and Crossfield Digital, the agency, was born in October of 2015.

Industries: E-Commerce, Location Based Services, Messaging, Mobile Apps, Search Engine, Social Media

Description: ImaSpanse is a smart social discovery service that takes the best parts of Meetup, Yelp, and Twitter to create a service.
Full Description: ImaSpanse is a smart social discovery service that takes the best parts of Meetup, Yelp, and Twitter to create a service that allows users to find who and what they want in an instant. In the same way Uber facilitates on-demand ride services, Fresh Direct on-demand groceries, and Netflix on-demand movies, ImaSpanse helps people find the world's biggest commodity: other people. Facebook and Meetup services force users to plan weeks, days, and hours before an event begins. ImaSpanse knows that planning is not in style anymore. People need to study now. They need to sell concert tickets now. They need to eat now. ImaSpanse shows people who and what is nearby, and gives them the tools to connect and make it happen.    While users are finding businesses through ImaSpanse, businesses are able to reach out to their consumers. Business discovery services like Yelp are static: businesses have no say in their image. But ImaSpanse moves with a business. It allows them to not only be on the go, but send location-based push marketing notifications directly to their customers phones. Today these services are primarily housed in third party apps. This requires a customer to download each corporation’s app (Starbucks, Dunkin Doughnuts, CVS, Walgreens...) cluttering phones. Most small businesses don't have and frankly don't want an app, but they would love to send their customers notifications. ImaSpanse provides access to this service as painlessly as Square gives small businesses access to accepting credit card payments.     ImaSpanse is quick, fast, and the answer to the next trend on the horizon: on-demand meeting. They make it as easy as calling an Uber, and as fun as curling up with a movie on Netflix, and as simple as swiping right on Tinder.

Full Description: DataLingvo is a service and API for building natural language interface into enterprise applications using voice or text. Define your data model using their APIs and let the business users securely interact with it using a free-form natural language. DataLingvo is built by developers and for developers. From well designed and simple APIs, Maven integration, to sophisticated semantic modelling and NLP capabilities - DataLingvo provides developers' friendly platform to build the most advance natural language applications in the world. DataLingvo’s patent pending Human Curated Linguistic technology powers the elusive “last mile” of the language comprehension. It enables real-time human curation eliminating probabilistic nature of traditional machine learning. DataLingvo detects missing information from user-defined intents and automatically asks for clarification from the user. DataLingvo provides powerful SaaS interface for end users to interact with custom data sources in Google-like fashion. Description: DatChat, Inc. is a personal privacy platform, focused on Encrypted Communication, Internet Security and Digital Rights Management.
Full Description: Currently no messaging platform allows you to change the rights to your messages after you hit send.  DatChat Messenger with total privacy control for both individual and group messages is the first   messenger that always gives you the option to erase or change how long your messages last on the other person’s phone.   It doesn’t matter if you set your messages to last forever or automatically self-destruct, because at any time each sender can wipe them off the recipient’s phone or give them more time.   Senders can choose to change the rights to a single message or destruct all of their messages at the same time.   Biggest threat to our Privacy:  While the media focuses on the potential for the government to invade our privacy, the real threat comes from what happen to our messages in our recipient’s hands and the potential embarrassment they might cause.  Personal and business relationships are constantly evolving and DatChat provides a way to manage the digital rights to our messages.  DatChat eliminates sender regret.

Industries: Consumer Goods, Emergency Medicine, Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), Health Care, Marketing, Medical Device, Mobile Apps, Software, Telecommunications, Wearables
Industry Groups: Apps, Consumer Electronics, Consumer Goods, Hardware, Health Care, Mobile, Sales and Marketing, Software
Description: B2B2C Teledentistry, Telehealth between MD-DDS-Patients: 24/7 coverage, 2nd opinions, consumer intra-oral camera, mobile dentistry support.
Full Description: Dentulu is the world's first mobile app providing Mobile Dentistry and Teledentistry solutions directly to consumers and dental professionals alike. Founded by a team of dental professionals and software engineers, Dentulu provides a number of HIPAA compliant Telemedicine services aimed at securing medical information, increasing access to virtual dental care and mobile dentists. Dentulu was the first to market with their mobile dental app and is available on mobile phones, tablets, desktop computers as well as online through the Dentulu Web Portal. Dentulu is also the first company in the world to go directly to consumers with the only dental wearable in the market in the form of a patient intra-oral camera that is used by patients to show a dental professional located in another physical location the inside of their oral cavity. Dentulu's proprietary software was developed by in house developers and incorporates all facets of Teledentistry with the intention of increasing access to virtual dental care. Dentulu provides 24/7 Emergency Dentists available to anyone using their mobile app and allowing consumers with dental emergencies to connect with a licensed dentist for consultations, referrals, 2nd opinions, and even medications.  Dentulu Teledentistry also supports mobile dentists and mid-level practitioners who currently provide mobile dental services to consumers, senior living enters, schools, and under-served communities. With similar functions and features of the Uber app, Dentulu matches up patients to local providers on the Dentulu network along with communication tools, payment gateway systems, product stores, and a review platform. Mobile dentists and RDHAP clinicians can use the Dentulu mobile app to connect with patients and also maintain continuity of care with existing patients.  Dentulu also has a non profit 501 (c) 3 called The Dentulu Smiles Foundation which provides Teledentistry solutions to volunteer groups, NGO's, and other non profits that provide remote dental and medical assistance to developing countries and at risk groups. Dentulu has been awarded multiple dental and technology innovation awards and is expanding their reach around the world as the best Teledentistry solution available on the market.  The Dentulu Intra-oral camera is a professional grade intraoral camera and is the only consumer camera currently on the market which can be sent to almost any home within 24-48 hours allowing patients to explore their mouths with the same visual tools available to dentists. This intraoral camera can also be used by dental professionals for marketing, post operative monitoring, and educational purposes. Cameras can also be left with a variety of different institutions as an educational tool and emergency tool for dental emergencies where a dentists involvement is necessary .  Dentulu's software allows dental professionals to establish potential patients as patients of record solving problems faced by clear aligner companies such as Smile Direct Club, Candid, and Invisalign who require a dentist to see the patient first and establish the patient as a patient of record. Dentulu also allows for electronic prescriptions to be sent to patients who require medication after completing a virtual consultation.

Industry Groups: Apps, Community and Lifestyle, Mobile, Software
Description: Dig - The Dog Person's Dating App is the best way for dog-lovers to find a compatible match and plan a dog-friendly date.
Full Description: Dig has developed a dating app that connects dog people based on what is important to them: their need for their future significant other to be compatible with their four-legged companion and the lifestyle of being a dog owner or lover. Dig is a novel app at the intersection of the booming pet tech and online dating industries. Dig has created a community of the most dedicated and emotional dog-lovers and dog owners. Dig leverages the demand for pet-forward relationships, experiences, and data by connecting the dog-loving community online as well as through localized events. In the US alone, there are 20 million single dog owners age 25 and over. Dig connects pet companies with this growing market with some of the lowest costs of user acquisition in the dating industry.  Dig users range from 18-75+. The majority of Dig users are 25-35 year old single dog-owners and dog-lovers in US metro areas. Dig’s users are strongly attached pet parents and those who see themselves as future pet parents. Small/medium dog businesses are customers for the daily deal and event sponsorships, and larger pet companies and businesses that want to be known as dog-friendly are partners and customers for larger sponsorships and co-promotional campaigns, and monthly Dig deals advertisement placements. Companies pay Dig through vendors and sponsorships for Dig events, to be featured on the Dig custom-built in-app advertising platform "daily deals," and for co-promotional creative and content for the Dig Unleashed blog and newsletter. Dig app users will pay for in-app purchases and monthly subscription tiers. Dig offers a variety of free features to enhance the dating-with-dogs experience, and additional paid feature options are being developed. Global Dating Insights says Dig "has been a viral hit over the past 12 months, landing features in Forbes, Bloomberg, Cosmopolitan, Cheddar and more," and "CEO Leigh Isaacson is building a highly engaged community of pet lovers and creating one of the sector’s strongest niche offerings." See all Dig press at DigDates.com/press.

Description: Bridging the gap between the digital and analog worlds.
Full Description: History is our story, and our story is all around us. Time Machine Tours is a free iPhone app that allows users to tap into the stories around them and actually "look" into the past. We can now display history right where it happened, in the palm of your hand, giving users relevant and interesting historical content in a context that was impossible a decade ago.  Remember going to the museum and carrying around a bulky "self-guided tour"?  These days more than half of adults have a smartphone more sophisticated than the computers that took us to the moon... in their pockets. Our software takes history out of the archives and into the real world. Our content is organized geographically to make discovering nearby history easy, but it can be accessed from anywhere in the world. Users can find out more about their way to work or browse distant histories. Have questions or want to find out how to build a tour? We would love to hear from you!

Description: Double Encore develops iOS and Android mobile applications for various brands.
Full Description: Double Encore was one of the early movers in the iPhone app consulting space. The company has a design-driven process, which it believes results in higher quality apps. Double Encore's customers include JetBlue, Major League Soccer, The SPEED Channel, and Denver Art Museum just to name a few. Double Encore has been recognized by Communicate Arts Interactive for their work developing the 91st PGA Championship and iBike Coach. In the early days of the app economy, the company developed the Brightkite iPhone application, which has been favorably reviewed by TechCrunch, Macworld, and a host of other web sites.  Other applications developed by the company include a series language learning apps called PencilBot and The Bad Decision Blocker (featured by TechCrunch, ABCNews, and CNN).  The company also built the 2nd generation of Liverail's SDK for iPhone which allows app developers to monetize their apps via embedded video pre-roll. In May 2009, the company announced that in the first 10 months of operation it has shipped 19 app releases, which is an average of one every 16 days. Double Encore was founded in summer 2008.

Industries: Apps, iOS, Mobile, Mobile Apps
Industry Groups: Apps, Mobile, Platforms, Software
Description: DRVN is the mobile app that helps parents coach teens to become safer drivers.
Full Description: Establishing safe driving habits doesn’t start at the driving school. It starts at home, from the first time they touch the wheel. DRVN is the first comprehensive mobile platform focused on providing teens and parents the tools and techniques to establish safe driving behavior. Auto accidents are the leading cause of death among teenagers. Every day, 10 teenagers die from auto accidents. Injuries, property damage and related costs from teen driving accidents cost more than $34 Billion per year in the U.S. Many solutions have been implemented by insurance companies, associations, non-profits and state and federal governments, but the problem continues to get worse.  So what do we do?  We need to look at the problem, and the solution, differently. The teen driving timeline has several key phases and the greatest opportunity for impact is the parent/teen supervised driving time. Introducing DRVN.

Industries: Cloud Computing, Developer Platform, Enterprise Software, Mobile, Mobile Apps, PaaS, SaaS, Software, Supply Chain Management
Industry Groups: Apps, Internet Services, Mobile, Software, Transportation
Description: Cloud Inventory® Solutions and Mobile-First Supply Chain Apps for the Digital Economy.
Full Description: Data Systems International® (DSI) is a digital supply chain platform that has created first-rate Cloud Inventory® and mobile-first supply chain solutions. DSI specializes in inventory management as a complete horizontal process, from manufacturing, to distribution, to the final mile, and they serve over 3,000 customers in more than 50 countries. DSI excels and helps customers achieve their supply chain goals through their four value props: optimization, compliance, revenue generation, and productivity. DSI offers a wide range of products that helps companies build a competitive advantage. Their Cloud Inventory® management applications include: (1) Inventory Management, which tracks inventory transfers and movements across multiple locations, cross-docking, and cycle counts; (2) Field Inventory™, which gets more jobs completed per day, accelerates the work order-to-cash cycle, maximizes calls completed in a day, and sends the correct information and parts for the job; (3) Direct Store Delivery, which performs real-time inventory checks, delivery confirmations with signature captures, creates and manages profiles, and improves delivery performance; (4) Receiving and Putaway, which tracks PO receiving, transfer orders, directed putaway, and has barcoded label printing functionality; (5) Manufacturing Support, which shows visibility on work orders, component picking, and assembly build; (6) Route Sales, which allows users to view current and future routes to track mileage, initiate replenishment and resolve issues on the spot, improves personnel productivity, and reduces manual-intensive paper based processes; (7) Order Fulfillment, which allows for single and multi-order picking, tote-based picking, zone picking, and the ability to configurate wave management; (8) Customer Engagement, which includes a product locator app, real-time inventory and order accuracy, and helps build customer loyalty; (9) Packing and Shipping, which includes packing list printing, ship label printing (FedEx, UPS, USPS/Endicia), packing and carton verification (QC), can assign ship license plates, and has a label designer. Their Add-On Products include an Enterprise Printing Platform™, Print Envoy, Insights, Hardware, IoT and M2M, and Integrations. DSI also has ERP apps including Oracle SCM Cloud, Scanworkx® Enterprise for Dynamics, and Scanworks™ for IFS.
